statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, address, purchase_history FROM customer_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id IN (1, 4, 6);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id > 5 AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information WHERE address <> 'Unknown' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) as total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE id IN (3, 5, 7);
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM product_info WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customer_info WHERE LENGTH(purchase_history) > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM order_info ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customer_info WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT p.product_name, p.product_price, o.order_total FROM product_info p JOIN order_info o ON p.product_id = o.order_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, pa.payment_amount FROM customer_info c JOIN order_info o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN payment_info pa ON o.order_id = pa.order_id WHERE pa.payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, address_line1, city, state FROM CustomerAddresses ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, quantity, total_price FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, order_date, quantity, total_price FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 2002 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
